Meatspac Minus Meatspac

It's like garfield minus garfield but with more meat.

MeatspacMinusMeatspac
  1. Drag bookmarklet to bookmarks bar
  2. Click it while on a meatspac
  3. Select a target
  4. Your target is now alone. Forever. Poor target.

Protip:Click the bookmark again to toggle it off! Click a third time to select a new target!
